thread.title: Dad And 4-Year-Old Daughter Sing Heartwarming Duet Of ‘You’ve Got A Friend In Me’
thread.title_full: Dad And 4-Year-Old Daughter Sing Heartwarming Duet Of ‘You’ve Got A Friend In Me’

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Dad And 4-Year-Old Daughter Sing Heartwarming Duet Of ‘You’ve Got A Friend In Me’
text:
Dad And 4-Year-Old Daughter Sing Heartwarming Duet Of ‘You’ve Got A Friend In Me’ Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! 
Claire Ryann Crosby may only be four years old, but she’s been wowing viewers since she was three! 
Claire has been singing and recording songs with her dad, Dave, since she was three and in this sweet duet, dad and Claire sing ‘You’ve Got A Friend In Me’ from Pixar’s Toy Story. 
Their new video has only been out a few days, but it’s already winning the hearts across the Internet. This is not the first time. Claire sang a Little Mermaid song and charmed millions of people around the globe. 
Dad Dave came up with the idea to sing and make videos with Claire after he saw Claire serenading customers at a gas station. Some of the strangers were so impressed by her that they began filming her with their mobile phones. “I knew I needed to catch it more formally on video to share it”, he told the The Desert News . 
In this video, the two show off their impressive harmony, and Claire is sensational as always! 
Check out their wonderful new duet in the video below. Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! Like Us On Facebook!
